item.title: Pyrocarb Nomad
item.description: Pyrocarb Nomade The Pyrocarb Nomad is an outdoor cooking stove which work with biomass , you can use pellets, pine cone, nuts or coco shell. With it you can be autonomous if you need to cook pasta, boil water or heat a can, it is the muste fr outdoor gourmet. Stop with oil and gas now you cook with renewable source of energy : in camping, hiking or on your balcony without disturbing your neighbours with smoke : with complete combustion , no smoke problem anymore.
